welcomeSpeech: Welcome to Satyam Interface. Boss is offline. You can view the portfolio and contact with him.

about: I’m Satyam Kumar, a Software Engineer currently working at Gyanyug Riginnovations.
I focus on building reliable, scalable software with clean structure and professional UI/UX.
I enjoy solving real-world problems, learning new technologies, and improving performance and code quality.
I’m interested in automation and engineering-based projects and I like building products that feel premium to use.

projects.title: Automatic Water Pump
projects.description: A system that automatically controls water flow based on water level sensing to prevent overflow and reduce manual effort.

projects.title: Automatic Door Lock
projects.description: An automatic door locking mechanism focused on safety and convenience, designed to lock/unlock based on defined conditions.

projects.title: Thermoelectric Generator
projects.description: A project exploring power generation using temperature difference (Seebeck effect) for energy harvesting applications.

projects.title: Portfolio Interface (JARVIS World)
projects.description: A futuristic 3D world portfolio with an assistant console and voice greeting for a premium first impression.

bullets: Working on software features and improvements for production systems.
Building clean UI modules and integrating APIs as required.
Collaborating with team members to deliver stable releases and bug fixes.
